p: Rust backend: Space JSON to .rbxlx conversion via HTTP API

f.main.rs: Axum HTTP server, POST /api/export endpoint with CORS
f.models.rs: SpaceJSON and Block structs for deserialization
f.validation.rs: Input validation: schema version, block count, bounds, colors, duplicates

x: SpaceJSON: Root payload with schema_version, name, blocks
Block: Voxel with x/y/z (Roblox studs) and hex color
generate_rbxlx(): Creates complete Roblox DataModel XML
hex_to_color3(): Hex string to Roblox Color3
